name: Plue no Daib?ken from Groove Adventure Rave
description:
In this game you play Plue, a character from the Rave Master / Groove Adventure Rave manga and anime series written by Hiro Mashima.

The game is a side scrolling platformer where the goal in each stage is to locate the exit to the next area. Plue can defeat his enemies by jumping on them (much in the same style as several games in the genre). And to aid him in his quest there are tons of various lollipops for him to eat, either for points, but also to give him various attributes to help him along. One lollipop will make a little arrow appear over his head to show him where to go, while another one might make give him some health back. There are over 100 types of candy in the game to be found.

Plue will occasionally run across various boss battles as well while he travels through the lands (and underwater in some cases).

shot.caption: Plue doing what he does best... eating sweets!
This interesting fellow helps you along by teaching you the controls and gives you some tips.
The heart lollipop will replenish one heart when eaten.
The variety of enemies in the game is really big, so you won't get sick of them any time soon.
That's what you get for eating a poop-lollipop! (Yes, there actually is such a thing in the game.)
Plue is down for the count! Continue?
After eating an arrow lollipop you get this helpful arrow above your head. It points you where you need to go to find the exit.
In this minigame Plue has to grab as much candy as possible while he's on a purple kangaroo (on auto pilot according to the sign he's holding).
The first boss encounter starts off tastefully by all of them farting at you.
How to cross this vast body of water? Plue's puzzled and sad.
